definition: papercutting (Chinese folk art)/to make paper cutouts
scissors/shears/clippers/CL:把[ba3]/to cut with scissors/to trim/to wipe out or exterminate
paper/CL:張|张[zhang1],沓[da2]/classifier for documents, letter etc

sentences.english: A major highlight of the ceremony is a unique paper-cut fashion show.
sentences.chinese: 颁奖典礼上一大亮点就是独特的剪纸时装秀。

sentences.english: The southern paper-cut is folk custom culture product in south of our country.
sentences.chinese: 南方剪纸是我国南方诸多民族民俗文化的产物。

sentences.english: In addition, a major highlight of the ceremony is a unique paper-cut fashion show.
sentences.chinese: 另外，在颁奖典礼上一大亮点就是独特的剪纸时装秀。

sentences.english: China Baoji folk handicraft, Papercut, Characters series, Four blessing has descended upon the house, handicraftsman created.
sentences.chinese: 宝鸡手工剪纸，文字系列，四喜临门，手工艺人创作。

sentences.english: Paper cuts which show the Chinese character for double happiness are often used to celebrate weddings.
sentences.chinese: 剪纸汉字双喜常常用于庆祝婚礼。

sentences.english: An artist makes a papercut portrait of US President Obama at the Yu Gardens in Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 上海豫园，艺术家在制作剪纸的奥巴马头像。

sentences.english: Homes are often decorated with cutouts of Chinese auspicious phrases and couplets.
sentences.chinese: 衡宇往往粉饰纸剪纸吉祥的中文词组和对子。

sentences.english: Finally, people will paste paper-cut with cat or tiger shapes on the door of silkworm rearing rooms.
sentences.chinese: 最后在蚕室的大门上张贴猫虎形剪纸。

sentences.english: The series of works starts serial inspiration design from the muse: paper-cutting techniques.
sentences.chinese: 作品利用剪纸的连续剪技法，展开系列性的设计发想。

sentences.english: Also invited to this site "Top Ten God scissors" paper-cut art show.
sentences.chinese: 还现场邀请本届“十大神剪”展示剪纸技艺。

sentences.english: Paper cut-out is a traditional folk art with long history in China.
sentences.chinese: 剪纸是我国历史悠久的传统民间艺术之一。

sentences.english: Wooden lid is decorated with pumpkin decal artwork.
sentences.chinese: 木制篮盖要用南瓜形状的剪纸艺术品作装饰。

sentences.english: In this paper we propose a method for computer to generate water animation with the style of paper-cuts.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出了一种计算机生成剪纸风格流水动画的方法。

sentences.english: Smooth leather upper with decorative cutouts at the front.
sentences.chinese: 光滑的皮革鞋面与在前面的装饰剪纸。

sentences.english: Interested in the cause of paper-cut on the paper-cutting cultural identity.
sentences.chinese: 热衷于剪纸事业，对剪纸文化认同。

sentences.english: Interested in the cause of paper-cut on the paper-cutting cultural identity.
sentences.chinese: 热衷于剪纸事业，对剪纸文化认同。

definition: woven palm fiber (used in handicraft)/coir/woven coconut fiber
batik (color printing on cloth using wax)
